channel.title: Diamond Light Pendant Information
channel.itunes:author: Michael
channel.description: OUR NEWLY DESIGNED FINE SILVER PENDANT ENHANCES MENTAL CLARITY. OUR BODIES ELECTRICAL SYSTEM CAN BE ENHANCED WITH CERTAIN GEOMETRY TO COMBINE HEALING AND SOOTHING EFFECTS. THE CLARITY VISUALISATION IS A FREE GIFT WITH THE PURCHASE OF THE MENTAL CLARITY PENDANT. IMAGINE A NEW SENSE OF CLARITY AND DIRECTION, PHYSICALY, MENTALY AND EMOTIONALLY. LISTEN AGAIN AND AGAIN AND RECEIVE DEEPER AND DEEPER LASTING CLARITY WHAT A GIFT.
